run_only_when_live.label: Only Run When Live
run_only_when_live.tooltip: Run the trivia minigame only when you are live.

permissions_players.label: Permissions to Play Trivia
permissions_players.tooltip: Set the permission level for participating in trivia

permissions_admins.label: Admin Permissions
permissions_admins.tooltip: Set the permission level for adding, removing, modifying questions and other tasks

duration_of_questions.label: Question Duration in Minutes
duration_of_questions.tooltip: Amount of time in minutes questions last.

duration_between_questions.label: Delay Between Questions in Minutes
duration_between_questions.tooltip: Amount of time in minutes between questions.

automatically_run_next_question.label: Auto-run Questions
automatically_run_next_question.tooltip: Automatically run the next question. If false, users have to type !trivia to start the next question.

show_answers_if_no_winners.label: Show Answers on Unanswered
show_answers_if_no_winners.tooltip: Show the question's answer(s) if nobody answers the question.

no_winners_response_string.value: Nobody answered the previous question. The answers were $answers.
no_winners_response_string.label: Format of Shown Answers
no_winners_response_string.tooltip: How the trivia answers are displayed on expiry. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers

enable_game_detection.label: Enable Game Detection
enable_game_detection.tooltip: If enabled, will log to trivialog.txt in the script directory.

twitch_channel_name.label: Twitch Username
twitch_channel_name.tooltip: Your username, used to fetch your last recorded game.

standard_question_ask_string.label: Standard Mode Question Format
standard_question_ask_string.tooltip: How the trivia questions are displayed in Standard Mode. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers

standard_question_reward_string.label: Standard Mode Reward Format
standard_question_reward_string.tooltip: The string displayed when somebody correctly answers in Standard Mode. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers, $user

enable_arena_mode.label: Use Arena Mode
enable_arena_mode.tooltip: Questions last x amount of time, determined by QuestionDelayInMinutes. All users with the correct answers during that time are rewarded.

enable_arena_points_dividing.label: Divide Points Among Winners
enable_arena_points_dividing.tooltip: When multiple people correctly answer, should the reward points be divided among them?

arena_question_ask_string.label: Arena Mode Question Format
arena_question_ask_string.tooltip: How the trivia questions are displayed in Arena Mode. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers

arena_question_reward_string.label: Arena Mode Reward Format
arena_question_reward_string.tooltip: The string displayed when somebody correctly answers in Arena Mode. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers, $user

enable_loyalty_point_rewards.label: Enable Loyalty Point Rewards
enable_loyalty_point_rewards.tooltip: Correct trivia answers reward loyalty points.

default_loyalty_point_value.label: Default Question Value
default_loyalty_point_value.tooltip: The default point value a question will have if none is supplied.

reward_scaling.label: Reward Scaling
reward_scaling.tooltip: Random = questions reward a random percentage range of their base value as a reward. Percentage = points increase/decrease permanently when the question is answered/unanswered.

point_value_random_lower_bound.label: Random Scaling: Lower Bound Percentage
point_value_random_lower_bound.tooltip: When using random scaling, the lower bound of possible point values is determined by this percentage.

point_value_random_upper_bound.label: Random Scaling: Upper Bound Percentage
point_value_random_upper_bound.tooltip: When using random scaling, the upper bound of possible point values is determined by this percentage.

point_value_decrease_answered.label: Percentage Scaling: Point Decrease Percent on Answered
point_value_decrease_answered.tooltip: Future currency reward amount will decrease by this percentage when somebody correctly answers a question. Lowers the value of easy questions.

point_value_increase_unanswered.label: Percentage Scaling: Point Increase Percent on Unanswered
point_value_increase_unanswered.tooltip: Future currency reward amount will increase by this percentage when nobody correctly answers a question. Increases the value of hard questions.

create_current_question_file.label: Write Question Text to File
create_current_question_file.tooltip: Log the current question to a file, useful for displaying the question on screen with a Text widget. Disables

debug_level.label: Level of Chatbot Logging
debug_level.tooltip: Choose verbosity of chatbot logging. Higher levels include all lower levels.

enable_chat_command_confirmations.label: Enable Chat Confirmations
enable_chat_command_confirmations.tooltip: Enable or disable chat messages that confirm successful command usages.

enable_file_logging.label: Enable File Logging
enable_file_logging.tooltip: If enabled, will log to trivialog.txt in the script directory.
